summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1761, for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to Sloop Place, in the City of Seattle, by regarding and curbing the same, and constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 18660, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
